Competency.name: Responsible for System X application Triage

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Nand Rathour has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 6 years. Currently he is employed as a Sr. Quality Assurance Analyst/Application Support at AT&T. Nand has extensive knowledge of SQL, TOAD, White-Box Testing, UNIX, Quality Assurance, Oracle PL/SQL, HP Quality Center, GUI Applications, Mercury Interactive Quicktest, Amdocs, Manual Testing, IVR, ETL, CTI. Nand has a considerable management experience (2.6 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2007-07-16 for 32 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a QA Analyst/Application Support at ITC & Uninor DMS.
